newton <- function(fun, tol = 1e-7, x0 = 1, N = 300){
  h <- 1e-7
  i <- 1
  x1 <- x0
  p <- numeric(N)
  while(i <= N){
    df.dx <- (fun(x0 + h) - fun(x0)) / h
    x1 <- (x0 - (fun(x0) / df.dx))
    p[i] <- x1
    i = i+1
    if(abs(x1 - x0) < tol) break
    x0 = x1
  }
  return(p[1:(i - 1)])
}
